---
title: "Weekly Lecture Notes"
knit: (function(input_file, encoding) {
  out_dir <- 'docs';

 encoding=encoding,
 output_file=file.path(dirname(input_file), out_dir, 'data.html'))})
date: "Last Updated: `r format(Sys.time(), '%B %e, %Y')`"
fontsize: 12pt
output: 
  html_document:
    includes:
      in_header: "favicon.html"
---
